product_name: Brooks Equilibrium Long-Sleeve T-Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Brooks Equilibrium long-sleeve T-shirt for women is a lightweight, moisture-wicking running top to keep you comfortable so you can focus on training,. Lightweight polyester fabric moves moisture away from your skin and dries quickly to keep you comfortable; a touch of added spandex allows freedom of movement. Mesh panels under arms increase ventilation to keep you from overheating. Flat seams feel comfortable against skin; reflective highlights increase visibility in low light and can be seen from any angle. The fitted Brooks Equilibrium long-sleeve T-shirt for women offers a close-to-body fit. Closeout.
